languages.text: "Молись не о том, чтобы она выжила, а о том, чтобы, если ей придется умереть, она сделала это с достоинством".
"Pray not for her survival, but for her honourable death, should it come to it."
languages.original_text: "Молись не о том, чтобы она выжила, а о том, чтобы, если ей придется умереть, она сделала это с достоинством".

traits.locale_text: "Pray not for her survival, but for her to die with honour should it come to it."
"Pray not for her survival, but for her to die with honour should it come to it."
"Pray not for her survival, but for her honourable death, should it come to it."
"Pray not for her survival, but for her honourable death, should it come to it."
"Pray not for her survival, but for her honourable death, should it come to it."
"Pray not for her survival, but for her honourable death, should it come to it."

languages.text: "Betet nicht für Ihr Überleben, sondern für ihren ehrenwerten Tod, sollte es dazu kommen."
languages.original_text: "Pray not for her survival, but for her honourable death, should it come to it."

traits.locale_text: "Betet nicht für Ihr Überleben, sondern für ihren ehrenwerten Tod, sollte es dazu kommen."

languages.text: « Ne priez pas pour sa survie, mais pour une mort honorable... on ne sait jamais. »
languages.original_text: "Pray not for her survival, but for her honourable death, should it come to it."

traits.locale_text: « Ne priez pas pour sa survie, mais pour une mort honorable... on ne sait jamais. »

languages.text: “如果她注定要死的话，不要祈祷她能活下来，要祈祷她死得光荣。”
languages.original_text: "Pray not for her survival, but for her honourable death, should it come to it."

traits.locale_text: “如果她注定要死的话，不要祈祷她能活下来，要祈祷她死得光荣。”

languages.text: 「婚約者が生きることを祈るより、栄誉ある死を遂げられるよう祈れ。万一ということもある」
languages.original_text: "Pray not for her survival, but for her honourable death, should it come to it."

traits.locale_text: 「婚約者が生きることを祈るより、栄誉ある死を遂げられるよう祈れ。万一ということもある」

languages.text: «No rece por su supervivencia, sino por su muerte honorable, si llega el caso».
languages.original_text: "Pray not for her survival, but for her honourable death, should it come to it."

traits.locale_text: «No rece por su supervivencia, sino por su muerte honorable, si llega el caso».

languages.text: "Hayatta kalması değil, onurlu bir ölüme kavuşması için dua et."
languages.original_text: "Pray not for her survival, but for her honourable death, should it come to it."

traits.locale_text: "Hayatta kalması değil, onurlu bir ölüme kavuşması için dua et."
